sentence: The sun is going down behind the hills.
He carefully climbed down the tree.
Please sit down and make yourself comfortable.
The rain came pouring down.
She looked down at her shoes.
Tears rolled down her cheeks.
He laid the heavy book down on the table.
The old wall finally fell down.
She bent down to pick up the coin.
The elevator is going down.
He wrote the important address down.
The leaves are falling down from the trees.
Please turn the music down.
The anchor slid down into the water.
He put his heavy bag down.
She crouched down to see the small flower.
The stock market went down today.
He took the picture down from the wall.
The river flows down to the sea.
The airplane is slowly descending down.
He walked down the stairs to the basement.
The cat jumped down from the fence.
She looked down from the high balcony.
The submarine traveled deep down.
He pushed the lever down.
The ball rolled down the steep hill.
They live just down the street.
He fell down but was not hurt.
The snow came down softly.
She is lying down on the sofa.
He motioned for everyone to get down.
The water level has gone down.
He looked down, feeling shy.
The path winds down the mountain.
The sign is on the back of the door.
He took a few steps back.
She looked back over her shoulder.
The car is in the back parking lot.
He went back to his house.
Please stand back from the fire.
She pushed her hair back from her face.
He sat in the back of the room.
The garden is at the back of the house.
Move back to make some space.
He turned his back to the audience.
The children are playing in the back yard.
He put the book back on the shelf.
The back of the chair is broken.
She took a step back in surprise.
Please use the back entrance.
He leaned back in his chair.
The pain in his back was getting worse.
She signaled for him to stay back.
He wrote the answer on the back of the envelope.
The soldiers were forced to move back.
The waves pushed the boat back.
There is a small tattoo on her back.
The cat arched its back.
He never looks back at his past.
The wind blew his hair back.
She stumbled and fell on her back.
He had to drive the car back home.
The dog ran back to its owner.
They sat in the back row of the theater.
She glanced back to see if he was following.
He folded the paper and put it back.
The back of the building is less decorated.
He fell backward onto the soft grass.
It is difficult to walk backward in a straight line.
The car rolled backward down the hill.
She took a quick glance backward.
He stumbled backward in surprise.
Can you count backward from ten?
The strong wind pushed him backward.
She leaned backward to avoid the ball.
The movie showed the events in backward order.
He took a small step backward.
The crab moved backward across the sand.
The force of the explosion threw him backward.
She tripped and fell backward.
The vehicle has no backward gears.
He tried to run, but could only move backward.
She looked backward one last time.
The dancer's backward movement was graceful.
He recited the alphabet backward.
The car slid backward on the ice.
The film ran backward for a few seconds.
He made a backward leap to safety.
The swimmer pushed backward from the wall.
She gave a backward wave as she left.
The chair tipped backward suddenly.
He tried to spell the word backward.
The company took a backward step.
The wind pushed the small boat backward.
He stumbled backward over the toy.
The car has a backward-facing camera.
The cannon's recoil pushed it backward.
She could not see the backward path.
The flow of water was moving backward.
He was thrown backward by the impact.
